mapper.insert: INSERT INTO warship_expendable (warship_id, expendable_type_id, expendable_num) VALUES (#{warshipId}, #{expendableTypeId}, #{expendableNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM warship_expendable WHERE warship_id = #{warshipId} AND expendable_type_id = #{expendableTypeId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM warship_expendable WHERE warship_id = #{warshipId} AND expendable_type_id = #{expendableTypeId}
